name: [BETA DEMO] Asylum 57
description:
The year is [REDACTED]. The zombie apocalypse has just broke out. Your name is Dawson Claybourd, you were assigned by your group of survivors to check through the large Aslyum on Redbird hill. They call it, Asylum 57. You have a gun and limited ammo to venture through. You soon come to find out, this is no ordinary Asylum. It's overrun by the undead and evil beings. The place seems to go on and on.

You must now fight for survival in this Maze known as Asylum 57. Will you make it out alive?

.....Or will you make it out at all???
